header.title: Why Choose Elita DNA Therapy?
header.text: Our team of professional therapists are here to help.Come learn and build confidence knowing your child is in the right hands.

solution.title: Founded & Managed by Therapists
solution.text: We were founded by professionals and want to provide the best results for our patients.

solution.title: We Maximize Each & Every Patient
solution.text: Meeting our patients therapeutically where they are, and getting them where they need to be.

solution.title: Only Therapists Treat Patients
solution.text: Our patients can be confident they are in the trusted hands of a professional.

solution.title: Our Comprehensive Team Approach
solution.text: No matter what specialty our patient is being seen, they always have access to the entire Elite DNA team.
